about_the_game:
The CDC recommends that people wear masks in public settings, at events and gatherings, and anywhere they will be around other people. You can rely on this fashionable, yet functional, mask to protect yourself and others from the deadly Coronavirus. Purchase of this item will unlock the COVID-19 Mask in-game item for Cuckold to wear. You will also receive a humorous in-game mail. That's it. It does nothing else... Yet.

Features


  • Protection: Made with three layers of soft non-woven fabric.
  • Breathable: Highly breathable fabric makes breathing easy.
  • Lightweight: The mask is only 0.04 mm thick and adds almost no pressure to your face.
  • Comfortable: Made of soft, non-woven fabric that is soft to the touch.
  • Form-Fitting: Features a bendable nose piece and solid weld elastics for a tight seal.
  • Indestructible: Mask will last forever and does not need to be replaced. Ever.
  • Chinese: Made in China
